text:
Vårdinnovation | Software Engineer | Stockholm, Lund, Malmö, Sweden | Onsite | https://vardinnovation.se/

Vårdinnovation is a new Swedish company developing new, intelligent solutions for healthcare.

We are looking for engineers to build (among other things) real-time chat solutions, video calls, and payment solutions to enhance our existing product. Our product currently increases the throughput by up to 30% for primary care units, by intelligently collecting and presenting patient data to doctors and nurses.

We already have top talent in machine learning, which we will continue to invest in long-term. Other products, e.g. for diabetes are in clinical evaluation.

Reply to me: ps@vardinnovation.se
